transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Amar ji se baat ho rahi hai IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Amar ji aapne call kiya tha kuch issue aa raha tha aapko.
Customer: Ji ji paisa refund karne ke liye humne call kiya tha.
Executive: Kyun sir aapko to maine bataya tha na video meeting mein link bheji thi maine aapko.
Customer: Are aapne video link mein bataya ekdam sab check kiya tha koi lead achcha nahi aa raha hai koi lead achcha nahi aa raha hai koi bolta hai mujhe saman nahi lena main inquiry nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Sir buyer list ki jagah aap inquiry form dekh rahe hain inquiry form mein do do call bhi aa rahi hai aapko customer ne bhi kiya hai aapko call bhi.
Customer: Kahan mil gaya aapko aake ye lead tha mujhe maal hasil karna mujhe maal.
Executive: Sir ek kaam kariye aapki aawaz thodi mujhe lag raha hai bike bike pe aap.
Customer: Haan bike pe.
Executive: Aap ek kaam kariye free hoke aapke paas mera number hai whatsapp ka main hi likh rahi hu aap wahan mujhe bataiye main video meeting kar rahi hu phir batati hu phir dekh lete hain.
Customer: Are video meeting video meeting karne se mera kaam nahi hoga na.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye aap meri baat suniye inquiry form dekh ke aise paisa refund nahi hota hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi hota to refund nahi dunga main paisa righting hai hum soch rahe the paisa pehle aapko dilate aapko.
Executive: Sir aapki aawaz mujhe achche se nahi aa rahi hai main wahi keh rahi hu aap free ho jaiye hum baat kar lete hain.
Customer: Main bola paisa paisa refund are suniye na paisa refund nahi hota hai na court hai court ke paisa refund lunga.
Executive: Court mein.
Customer: IndiaMART ko leke court mein jayenge.
Executive: Aisa lene ke liye.
Customer: Aisa nahi milega to aap mere sath ye dhokha dhadi ho gaya.
Executive: Sir baat dekhiye aap baat suniye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Main wahi keh rahi hu agar aapko nahi aa raha na requirement to main bolti but sir aapko requirement aati hai aap check nahi karte.
Customer: Hum check kya meri baat ko inquiry nahi check kar sakte.
Executive: Sir agar requirement nahi hai to aap aaiye video meeting mein agar nahi hai to phir hum karenge baat lekin aap requirement check karke aise thodi ho jayega main complaint kar dunga court mein kaise nahi hoga pehle mujhe check karna padega aapko profile.
Customer: Aap profile check kiya aapne profile ka report nahi dega kya aap.
Executive: Aap check karenge tabhi to mera profile check karna padega.
Customer: Ye kya hai aapke paas aapko kaam hai hamare paas sab screen shot lete rahe hain isliye complaint mein hum screen shot le rahe hain.
Executive: Sir aap jab free ho jayega abhi aap bike pe hain to aap ek baar video meeting mein jab aaiye main check kar leti hu agar aapke paas ek bhi requirement nahi aa rahi hai tab hum dekhte hain ki hum kya kar sakte hain lekin sir aisi koi policy IndiaMART mein hoti nahi hai aapko aapko jinhone bhi diya tha Shubham ji ne ya phir jinhone bhi aap mujhe bata to agar unhone bola hai to.
Customer: Kya bola hai wo to kiska aadmi hai kiska beta hai ya kya pata nahi hai koi nahi pata kya bolu aapko kya bolu aapko wo aadmi kiska beta hai kiska beta hai wo kaun chala gaya batao.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART use kar rahe hain aap kitne time se IndiaMART use kar rahe hain.
Customer: Iske pehle aapne bhi chalaya hai ek trust seal bhi chalaya hai chalaya hai.
Executive: Nahi seal hai.
Customer: MDC humne band kar diya tha ek trust seal chalaye trust seal mein jo thoda business hua hum nahi batate hain.
Customer: Paisa pehle aapko itna jyada.
Executive: Ha to black ye black form hi hai ye MDC is time sabhi IndiaMART pe hi hai abhi bhi IndiaMART pe hi hai aap agar kyun check nahi karte hain requirement check karenge tab to aap humse baat karenge na aap aaiye inquiry form check karte rehte hain sir problem sirf itna hai ki aap inquiry ke peeche bhagte hain.
Customer: [inaudible] check karna padega na.
Executive: Aap ek kaam dekhiye main bol rahi hu aap ek baar aap ek baar jab free ho jaiye aap free ho jaiye.
Executive: Ek baar check kar leti hu main agar aapko requirement nahi aa rahi hai ki mujhe requirement nahi aa rahi hai agar requirement nahi aa rahi hai to main dekhti hu aur requirement aa rahi hogi to phir dekhenge sir aapko baat karni padegi buyer se.
Customer: Buyer kya baat hai jo cheez nahi hai aap mujhe ye jo ye jo uske baad mein sare buyer se baat ki hai october mein 197 inquiry aayi hai suniye october mein 197 inquiry aayi hai 24 buyer hai aapne 91 buyer list send ki hai mujhe har buyer ka detail bata dijiye ki is buyer se meri baat hui hai aur usne ye bola hai aur sare buyer ne mana kar diya hai itne buyer ka mujhe detail de dijiye aap.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aap kya keh rahe hain.
Customer: Har detail aap main wo bhi aapko detail dunga main aise nahi bolunga main meri baat kiya tha sir theek hai main aapko detail har ek sath dunga kya bola kya nahi main wahi nahi raha abhi.
Executive: Main wahi keh rahi hu sir dekhiye aap samjhiye hume bhi koi issue nahi hai lekin sir hum bhi aise bina kisi proof ke hum baat nahi kar sakte na aap mujhe sare buyer ka detail do main aap aage forward karti hu.
Executive: Theek hai aap free hoke mujhe call kariye main video meeting arrange karti hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the subscription amount.

- Claims no good buyleads are being generated.

- Alleges fraud due to lack of business.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to join a video meeting.

- Executive offered to check the profile.

- Asked for buyer details to forward.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after becoming free.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, video meeting
